I’ve been able to fix those little errors it had in it, i have one more question. i know i need hitupdaterequired set to true to refresh the number in stats menu, but how could i do it without having a 0 hitdiff showing up on the character, and it’s hp bar? So just to refresh that number?

item.title: Regenerating?(auto-heal by time)
item.dc:creator: @Zilchary Zilchary
item.description:
@Zilchary wrote:

add this near your ints (search for something like public int)

public int hpTimer = 0;

in “public boolean process”

put this in :

hpTimer -= 1; if(hpTimer < 0 && playerLevel[3] < 
	getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])){
	hpTimer = 40;

}
if(hpTimer == 0 && playerLevel[3] <

	getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])){
	playerLevel[3] += 1;

}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Regenerating?(auto-heal by time)
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Hi. i’m making auto-heal for my server (you ragain hp after some time…)
So, i’ve made this void, put in boolean process, and it’s in the right place. I get no errors. Here is it:

//HEALING public int Htime = 0; public void regenerate(){ if(Htime >= 30 && playerLevel[3] > currentHealth){ sendMessage("You regenerate 1 hp"); currentHealth += 1; } if(Htime >= 1){ Htime = 0; } Htime++; }Can someone tell me why wont it work?
Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
